Home.title: Roe the Dev
Home.description: Roe is a creative technologist and artist. Read his blog, view their portfolio, and see their experiments.

About.title: About Roe
About.subtitle: Tech Lead, Software Engineer, Mentor And Artist
About.description1: I am a versatile digital nomad and innovative creative technologist assuming the role of a tech lead while embracing a nomadic lifestyle, dedicated to bringing creative ideas to fruition.
About.description2: I pursued my education at Black Hawk College and The Illinois Institute of Art in Chicago, achieving an associate's degree in visual communications. With a professional tenure of over a decade, I have accumulated substantial experience in software development.

SketchBook.title: Sketch Book Vol 1 Playground
SketchBook.description: Explore the Sketch Book Vol 1 Playground by Roe Greene, a creative technologist and artist.
SketchBook.cta-notice:
Locking the scketchbook allows you to add to the pages.
 After 60 minutes, the lock will remove automatically and you will not be able to make any more changes until the sketchbook is available again.
SketchBook.faq-1: The sketchbook is a shared space where you can draw on the pages. You can lock the sketchbook to prevent others from drawing on the pages. You can also unlock the sketchbook to allow others to draw on the pages. The sketchbook will automatically unlock after 60 minutes.
SketchBook.faq-2: Everything is completely anonymous. No personal data is stored. If you want to mark your name on the sketchbook though, you are free to do so at your own risk.
SketchBook.faq-3: I have the ability to edit what is in the sketchbook, so please keep it respectful. I will be monitoring the sketchbook to ensure that it is a safe and fun place for everyone.
SketchBook.faq-4: There are only 10 pages available in the sketchbook. I am happy to add more pages if there is interest.
